title: Spinach and carrot quiche
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 onion, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 500g packet frozen spinach, thawed', '70g grated carrots', '225g grated cheese, such as Cheddar, Gruyere or Emmentaler', '6 eggs', '1/2 teaspoon crushed red chilli flakes', '1/8 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon pepper', '2 (23cm) pastry cases']
